start.text: All right, men! Time to wage war!

retreat.text: Let us be on our way.

need_help.text: Let them attack. I will have their hearts.

pursuing.text: We have the enemy in our sights.

hull_50.text: You will not fear! You will not falter! You will not give a single step to the enemy!
A true servant never yields to doubt.

hull_30.text: I will not accept this defeat!

overload.text: What manner of heresy is this?

death.text: Only in death does duty end.

victory.text: The hand of the Emperor guides all.
